      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long createCompany(Company comp)
      create a company on the DB.
      java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
      this method gets all the companies from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      Company getCompany(long compId)
      this method returns from the DB 1 company details with the specified companyID, creates a new Company java bean, sets all of the parameters according to the DB information retrieved, and returns that Company object.
      Company getCompanyByName(java.lang.String name)
      this method uses a company name as a received parameter and returns that company as an object from the DB, if exists.
      double getCompanyIncome(Company comp)
      this method is used to get a specific Company's income listing from the DB.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCoupons(Company comp)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified company from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByPrice(Company comp, double price)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified company from the DB up to a specified price, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(Company comp, CouponType type)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified type, of a specified company from the DB, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsUpToDate(Company comp, java.sql.Date endDate)
      this method gets all the coupons of a specified company from the DB up to a specified date, creates a java bean for each one and adds them to an ArrayList collection.
      boolean login(java.lang.String compName, java.lang.String password)
      this method is called from the CouponSystem level and gets a name and password.
      void removeCompany(Company comp)
      remove a company from the DB using using its company.id as identifier
      void removeCompanyWithId(long id)
      this method removes a company from the DB using it's DB id passed in as a parameter.
      void updateCompany(Company comp)
      update a company (password, email) on the DB using its company.id as identifier
      void updateCompanyIncome(Coupon coupon)
      this method is used in order to keep track of companies' income generated from selling coupons.
      void updateCompanyWithId(long id, java.lang.String newName, java.lang.String newPassword, java.lang.String newEmail)
      ## This is a UTILITY method ## update a company on the DB based on it's DB Id passed in as a parameter, along with the attributes to change.

              throws ConnectionPoolException,

        Description copied from interface: CompanyDAO
        this method is called from the CouponSystem level and gets a name and password. checks the DB to see if it exists and fits, and returns true to allow a successful login and acquiring a facade.

      • updateCompanyIncome

        public void updateCompanyIncome(Coupon coupon)
                         throws ConnectionPoolException,
                                DAOException
        Description copied from interface: CompanyDAO
        this method is used in order to keep track of companies' income generated from selling coupons. each time a customer purchases a coupon, this method gets the coupon as a parameter, finds the Company associated with it on the DB, check to see whether this Company has former income documentation and then creates/updates that income documentation accordingly.
        Specified by:
        updateCompanyIncome in interface CompanyDAO
        Throws:
        ConnectionPoolException
        DAOException

      • getCompanyIncome

        public double getCompanyIncome(Company comp)
                        throws ConnectionPoolException,
                               DAOException
        Description copied from interface: CompanyDAO
        this method is used to get a specific Company's income listing from the DB. returns 0 if no income has been generated yet or the company does not exist.
        Specified by:
        getCompanyIncome in interface CompanyDAO
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ConnectionPoolException
        DAOException
